subject: Re: Prolegomena for a new QS font. And here it is.
msgSnippet: Thanks to all who sent their feedback on my font effort of last month. Excuse me for not responding to you all individually. I don t know where else on the
messageBody:
Thanks to all who sent their feedback on my font effort of last
month. Excuse me for not responding to you all individually.

I don't know where else on the planet I could have turned for such
valuable comments and gentlemanly criticism.

I have corrected my numerous misspellings, and tweaked many letters
based on your collective comments. I also made one letter change which no
one suggested: "Owe", which looked exactly like an "O," clearly violated
Shaw's dictum that no characters should be mistaken for Roman characters.
Now it looks more like Read's original.

I have replaced the original sampler "Fish Story" piece in the files
section with a revised version, and posted True Type fonts for PC and Mac in
the fonts file.

Let me know if you have any trouble using them.

hAppI kwikskriptiN!

Thanks to all who sent their feedback on my font effort of last
month. Excuse me for not responding to you all individually.

I don't know where else on the planet I could have turned for such
valuable comments and gentlemanly criticism.

I have corrected my numerous misspellings, and tweaked many letters
based on your collective comments.  I also made one letter change which no
one suggested: "Owe", which looked exactly like an "O," clearly violated
Shaw's dictum that no characters should be mistaken for Roman characters.
Now it looks more like Read's original.

I have replaced the original sampler "Fish Story" piece in the files
section with a revised version, and posted True Type fonts for PC and Mac in 
the fonts file.

Let me know if you have any trouble using them.

hAppI kwikskriptiN!
